TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed DateTimeKind extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether a object represents a local time, a Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or is not specified as either local time or UTC.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A member of the DateTimeKind enumeration is returned by the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The members of the DateTimeKind enumeration are used in conversion operations between local time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), but not in comparison or arithmetic operations. For more information about time conversions, see [Converting Times Between Time Zones](../Topic/Converting%20Times%20Between%20Time%20Zones.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DateTimeKind Local = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The time represented is local time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DateTimeKind Unspecified = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The time represented is not specified as either local time or Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DateTimeKind Utc = int32(1)
